title: Chat Bot Configuration
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: ChatBot configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "support_chat_url" as needed to force display.
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)

NOTE: Making changes to the configuration may take a few minutes to propagate and/or require a few app restarts


GIVEN Ballpark app is installed* 

*Chatbot feature introduced w/ 11.4.0
custom_expected: For feature flag in remote config - if the URL is present then the icon should be considered active for both tabs

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the support_chat_url within config updated and published with correct URL(s)*
WHEN the user is on the Home Tab

[iOS] - ballpark://webview?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchat.satis.fi%2F%3FpageID%3D11070
[Android] - https://chat.satis.fi/?pageID=11070
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN chat feature is enabled
AND user is shown the chat icon* at the top right

*icon is shown as a chat bubble with 3 dots inside

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the support_chat_url within config updated and published with correct URL(s)*
WHEN the user is on the Tickets Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN chat feature is enabled
AND user is shown the chat icon* at the top right

*icon is shown as a chat bubble with 3 dots inside

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the support_chat_url within config updated and published with missing/empty URL(s)*
WHEN the user is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN chat feature is disabled 
AND user is NOT shown the chat icon

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the support_chat_url within config updated and published with missing/empty URL(s)*
WHEN the user is on the Tickets Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN chat feature is disabled 
AND user is NOT shown the chat icon

title: Chat Bot Icon - Home Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the support_chat_url within config updated and published with correct URL(s)*
AND Ballpark app is installed** 


[iOS] - ballpark://webview?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchat.satis.fi%2F%3FpageID%3D11070
[Android] - https://chat.satis.fi/?pageID=11070
**Chatbot feature introduced w/ 11.4.0

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN chat feature is enabled
AND user is shown the chat icon* at the top right

*icon is shown as a chat bubble with 3 dots inside

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Chat Bot icon on the Home Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the chat assistant experience

custom_steps_separated.content:
(this step requires access to Adobe and/or access to ProxyTool to verify the action sent)

[THIS VALIDATION CAN BE SKIPPED, IF ACCESS HAS NOT BEEN GRANTED]
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND an Adobe action will be sent: 
'MLB Ballpark : Home : Chatbot Click'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates through chat (via options presented)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN chat bot responds accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user types a question 
AND submits via either 'submit arrow on the right' or device keyboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN chat bot responds accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the info icon next to 'Ask a question' field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Privacy & Legal Policies page is shown with appropriate links

(can validate the links and dismissal via 'X', but this page is handled by the clubs - external to BP app)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the refresh icon on the top right
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the page is refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user closes the webview
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to the Home tab
